name: .WGI
summary: Learn about .WGI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: WGI files can be played using the software packaged with your Wildgame Innovations camera (Windows, Mac) or with VideoLAN VLC media player (cross-platform). You may also be able to play a WGI file in other media players by changing the file's extension to .avi.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .wgi file in VLC media player
images.caption: WGI file open in VLC media player
